trans-unit.source: Represents a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组在评估 SAML 断言的有效性时必须考虑的条件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全令牌使用指定其声明 SAML 断言以及一组在评估 SAML 断言的有效性时必须考虑的条件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The SamlConditions class represents the set of conditions.
trans-unit.target: SamlConditions 类表示条件的集。

trans-unit.source: An example of a condition is whether the SAML assertion must not be cached, which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 条件的一个示例是是否 SAML 断言不得缓存，这由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>类。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines two conditions and it allows for the set of conditions to be extended.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范定义了两个条件，它允许进行的条件集扩展。

trans-unit.source: The two conditions defined by the SAML specification are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范所定义的两个条件是<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>

trans-unit.source: To define a new condition, derive a class from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义新的条件，可从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition>类</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition>派生一个类

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> class using the specified timeframe that the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref>类使用 SAML 断言是有效的指定时间范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> properties are stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>属性存储以协调世界时 (UTC)。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定 SAML 断言时有效的最初时刻。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定 SAML 断言过期的时刻。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> class using the specified timeframe and conditions when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref>类使用的指定时间范围和条件，如果 SAML 断言有效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> properties are stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>属性存储以协调世界时 (UTC)。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定 SAML 断言时有效的最初时刻。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定 SAML 断言过期的时刻。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"></xref> that specifies a set of conditions that a recipient of a SAML assertion must take into account in assessing the validity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"> </xref> ，它指定一组 SAML 断言的接收方必须考虑到在评估断言有效性的条件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions*>

trans-unit.source: conditions contains a member that is .
trans-unit.target: conditions包含的成员 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of conditions that must be taken into consideration when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取评估 SAML 断言的有效性时考虑的必须执行的条件集。

trans-unit.source: The Conditions property corresponds to the `\<saml:Conditions>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: 条件属性对应于`\<saml:Conditions>`OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"></xref> that specifies a set of conditions that a recipient of a SAML assertion must take into account when assessing the validity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"> </xref> ，它指定一组 SAML 断言的接收方在评估断言有效性时必须考虑到的条件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此实例的属性是否是只读的。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使此实例的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>类只读的调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此实例的属性是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 MakeReadOnly 方法时，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>属性设置为`true`和能不能再设置此实例的属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SAML 断言时有效的最初时刻。

trans-unit.source: The NotBefore property corresponds to the `NotBefore` attribute of the `<saml:Conditions>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: NotBefore 属性对应于`NotBefore`属性`<saml:Conditions>`OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定 SAML 断言时有效的最初时刻。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SAML 断言过期的时刻。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> property corresponds to the `NotOnOrAfter` attribute of the `<saml:Conditions>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>属性对应于`NotOnOrAfter`属性`<saml:Conditions>`OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定 SAML 断言过期的时刻。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref>从指定的 XML 读取器的元素。

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method sets the following properties: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions%2A>
trans-unit.target: ReadXml 方法会设置以下属性:- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref>元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够读取 SAML 规范中定义的 SAML 授权语句中的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>的数字签名的子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> ，确定创建了数字签名的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: reader is -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: readeris -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 写入<xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref>元素插入指定的 XML 序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions> instance into a `<saml:Conditions>` element.
trans-unit.target: WriteXml 方法用于编写当前<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>实例`<saml:Conditions>`元素。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>编写<xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref>元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够写入 SAML 断言中的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够写入<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句。

trans-unit.source: writer is -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris -or- samlSerializer is .
